attributes.action: Criminalize the promotion of death to human life
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned ask the government to acknowledge the scientific truth of the start of human life. The UN Charter of human rights declares "Everyone has the right to life, liberty and security of person." all of which are abandoned for the unwanted individual. It is time the government owned up to the inconvenient truth that it is wrong to kill a child in any state, not because it is the popular thing to do, but the right one.
